[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868076135708-Specifying-the-product-rate-type-for-your-product#main-content) * * * Learn how to [specify the product rate type](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868076135708-Specifying-the-product-rate-type-for-your-product#h_01GP99RGR65M0F0GD6EJTMWTPA) for your product to determine at which increments products are priced (e.g. Per Hour, Per Booking...). Learn more about the Pricing tab here: [Step 4: Configuring pricing for your product](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868447240860) New to the Product Builder _?_ Read the [first article in this series](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868111632796) for an introduction to the Product feature. * * * ## **Accessing the features mentioned in this article** **Where can I find this feature using the top menu?** Inventory > Products > Products > Add Product/Add New Product/Edit Product > Pricing **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to manage inventory or [restricted permissions](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868490374428) to _View products and assets_ and _Manage products and assets_. **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - Your account must have access to classic products (Inventory > Products), a key feature of our classic products version of [_Checkfront_](https://www.checkfront.com/). This feature is **not available for use with classic items**(Inventory > Items) in our classic items version. → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052). * * * ## Specifying the product rate type [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868076135708-Specifying-the-product-rate-type-for-your-product# "Back to top") ![Rate Type](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868092212380) Define how pricing is calculated when this product is added to a booking. The options presented here depend on how you have configured your product under the **Availability** tab ( _All Day_, _Nightly_, _Timeslots_, or _Flextime_). The following table illustrates these options. | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Availability** | **Per Booking** | **Per 24 Hours** | **Per Time Increment** | **Example** | | _All Day_ | ✓ | X | ✓ Per Day | All-day bike rentals at $50.00 per day. | | _Nightly_ | ✓ | X | ✓ Per Night | Room rentals at $100.00 per night. | | _Timeslots_ | X | X | ✓ Per timeslot/Per hour | Kayak rentals at $25.00 per hour. | | _Flextime: 10 minutes_ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ per 10 minutes | Zipline bookings are scheduled at 15-minute increments and are charged $75.00 per booking. | | _Flextime: 15 minutes_ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ per 15 minutes | | _Flextime: 20 minutes_ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ per 20 minutes | | _Flextime: 30 minutes_ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ per 30 minutes | | _Flextime: 1 Hour_ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ per Hour | | | | | --- | --- | | ![Example](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868064073244) | **Per Booking vs. Per Time Increment Example**
For example, if you configured a room rental with a base rate of $100.00 and a time increment of _Per Day_, a 5-day booking would be billed at $500.00. The same product would be billed at $100.00 for all 5 days if configured _Per Booking_. | With the next article in this series, we look at configuring the base rates for your product. * * * \|    [Configuring base rates for your product >](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868202955932) * * *
